sentences.en: "Oh really?" he said, arching an eyebrow.
sentences.cn: “哦，真的吗？”他扬起一边的眉毛说。

sentences.en: "Who's your publisher?" — "Lockett Press," she said, and she raised an eyebrow meaningfully.
sentences.cn: “你的出版商是谁？”——“洛基特出版社，”她回答道，并意味深长地扬了扬眉毛。

sentences.en: An intriguing item on the news pages caused me to raise an eyebrow over my morning coffee.
sentences.cn: 早晨喝咖啡时，新闻版面的一则趣闻令我感到惊奇。

sentences.en: Googlebot: ( raises a harried eyebrow and looks annoyed ) Where shall I begin?
sentences.cn: 竖起眉毛且看起来很生气 ) 我该从何说起 呢 ?

sentences.en: He had sustained a cut on his left eyebrow.
sentences.cn: 他左眼眉上留下了一道疤。

sentences.en: He raised an eyebrow at Jack.
I can't go to the movie -- I'm up to my eyebrow.
sentences.cn: 我不能去看电影, 我很忙很忙.

sentences.en: She did not so much as raise an eyebrow.
sentences.cn: 她甚至连眉毛也不抖动一下.

sentences.en: She looked up at me significantly, raising an eyebrow.
sentences.cn: 她抬起头，眉毛扬起，意味深长地看着我。

sentences.en: That eyebrow is not ox horn, right? It borns an ox nose.
sentences.cn: 那是眉毛不是牛角吧? 到是长了一牛鼻子.

sentences.en: The saleswoman raised an eyebrow skeptically; her voice sharpened.
sentences.cn: 女推销员疑惑的扬扬眉毛,提高了嗓门.

sentences.en: This new tendency has raised many a conservative eyeBrow.
sentences.cn: 这种新趋势引起了许多保守派人士的非难.

sentences.en: With an eyebrow raised, he seemed divided between surprise and amusement.
sentences.cn: 他一只眉毛扬了扬, 似乎既感到吃惊,又觉有趣.

phrases.tran_cn: 抬眉，扬眉（表示吃惊、不信或轻度反对）

trans.tran_en: the line of hair above your eye

trans.tran_cn: 为…描眉；用皱眉蹙额迫使
